biotools.summary:
A Multi-Target de novo Drug Design Approach.

With the rapid development of systems-based pharmacology and poly-pharmacology, method development for rational design of multi-target drugs has becoming urgent. In this paper, we present the first de novo multi-target drug design program LigBuilder V3, which can be used to design ligands to target multiple receptors, multiple binding sites of one receptor, or various conformations of one receptor.
